ls.name: ls
ls.title: list directory contents
ls.description: List information about the FILEs (the current directory by default).

cd.name: cd
cd.title: change directory
cd.description: Change the current directory to the specified path.

grep.name: grep
grep.title: print lines matching a pattern
grep.description: Search for PATTERN in each FILE or standard input.

find.name: find
find.title: search for files in a directory hierarchy
find.description: Search for files in a directory hierarchy based on various criteria.

cat.name: cat
cat.title: concatenate files and print on the standard output

echo.name: echo
echo.title: display a line of text
echo.description: Echo the STRING(s) to standard output.

mkdir.name: mkdir
mkdir.title: make directories
mkdir.description: Create the DIRECTORY(ies), if they do not already exist.
